parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The information about the returned pipeline. For more information, see [logstash.yml](https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/logstash/6.7/logstash-settings-file.html).

parameters.name: PipelineId
parameters.description: The ID of the ApsaraVideo Media Processing (MPS) queue that is used to run the job.
